class.name: BoxShape3D
class.description: 3D box shape to be added as a [i]direct[/i] child of a [PhysicsBody3D] or [Area3D] using a [CollisionShape3D] node. [b]Performance:[/b] Being a primitive collision shape, [BoxShape3D] is fast to check collisions against (though not as fast as [SphereShape3D]).

members.member: The box's width, height and depth.
